type: TS LF Trading Bot Error - Invalid Exchange API Secret

definition.text: The secret belonging to the Exchange API Key you provided was not recongnized by the Exchange as a valid one.

paragraphs.text: Double check that you copied the key at the codeName property and the secret at secret property without bringing any invisible caracter from the exchange web site, or leaving any character from the sample text. Also check that the keys are not disabled at the exchange ot that they are not restricted by IP.
In the following section you will find the specific information received when this error occured.
You will only see it if you opened this page as a result of the error actually happening.
